name: Dying Gasp
entries: When a creature dies, you can grasp its dying energies to force it to make an attack against one creature within its reach. If it has a weapon the attack deals that weaponâ€™s damage but uses your Spell Attack bonus for the attack and damage roll, if it does not have a weapon it deals 1d4 for a Tiny creature, 1d6 for small, 1d8 for medium, 1d10 for large, 1d12 for huge, and 2d8 for gargantuan.
